channel.title: How do I connect to my server?
channel.description:
Hey, I was just wondering how do I connect to my RSC server?
I have the wamp and apache set up and what-not.
[code] C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\j dk1.6.0_26\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Live\Shared;C:\Program Files\Java\ jdk1.6.0_26\bin;;C:\apache-ant-1.8.3\bin
C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jd k1.6.0_16
C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>ant demonikp2p Buildfile: C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server\build.xml
demonikp2p: [java] [12:29:52 21-05-12] Server starting up... [java] .\conf [java] [12:29:53 21-05-12] Connected to MySQL [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (201,748) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (198,749) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (201,748) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (196,748) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (199,752) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)
[java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (200,750) [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] com.rscd.packethandler.ProcessNameHandler [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] GameEngine now running [java] [12:29:56 21-05-12] Address already in use: bind [java] Successfully saved 0 players. [/code]
That is the server run prompt- thingy. (Sorry can't think of exact name for it)
But, every time I try to run the client and connect I check the status of the server and they say it's offline unless I change the IP in the settings.ini file to localhost, and even after I change the IP to local host the status says it's online but, I go to log in and it says that 'Error failed to decode profile - contact an admin'
I'm using DivinePK 5.0,
Thanks in advance

item.title: How do I connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Osir1s Osir1s
item.description:
@Osir1s wrote:


Do you use your IP in another source already?

Do you use your IP in another source already?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I connect to my server?

item.title: How do I connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @iDream iDream
item.description:
@iDream wrote:

Hey, I was just wondering how do I connect to my RSC server?

I have the wamp and apache set up and what-not.

C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\j
dk1.6.0_26\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Live\Shared;C:\Program Files\Java\
jdk1.6.0_26\bin;;C:\apache-ant-1.8.3\bin

C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jd
k1.6.0_16

C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server>ant demonikp2p
Buildfile: C:\Users\*\Desktop\Divine pk v5.0\Server\build.xml

demonikp2p:
     [java] [12:29:52 21-05-12] Server starting up...
     [java] .\conf
     [java] [12:29:53 21-05-12] Connected to MySQL
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (201,748)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (198,749)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (201,748)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (196,748)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (199,752)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746)

     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou
ndary (200,750)
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] com.rscd.packethandler.ProcessNameHandler
     [java] [12:29:55 21-05-12] GameEngine now running
     [java] [12:29:56 21-05-12] Address already in use: bind
     [java] Successfully saved 0 players.

That is the server run prompt- thingy. (Sorry can’t think of exact name for it)

But, every time I try to run the client and connect I check the status of the server and they say it’s offline unless I change the IP in the settings.ini file to localhost, and even after I change the IP to local host the status says it’s online but, I go to log in and it says that ‘Error failed to decode profile - contact an admin’

I’m using DivinePK 5.0,

Thanks in advance
